DataElement.preferredName: Collection Date Days From Anchor Date Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Time interval between the participant's index date and the date the specimen was collected, measured in days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Collection Date Day From Anchor Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The date on which the sample or data was collected._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._The base date from which all other dates within a cohort or data set are derived.
